snippet: From the moment Mr. Romney stepped to the podium in Denver, flanked by two tele-prompters, even he knew that he was not having a good day.
abstract: From the moment Mr. Romney stepped to the podium in Denver, flanked by two tele-prompters, even he knew that he was not having a good day.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

headline.main: For Romney, Night Goes from Bad to Worse
